state.description: State or province details from StateProvince table.

postalCode.description: Postal code for the street address.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

AddressDTO.description: Street address information for customers, employees, and vendors.

businessEntityId.description: Primary key. Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID.

address.description: Based on Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

addressType.description: Based on Foreign key to AddressType.AddressTypeID.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

BusinessEntityAddressDTO.description: Cross-reference table mapping customers, vendors, and employees to their addresses.

stateProvinceCode.description: ISO standard state or province code.

stateProvinceCodeUnavailable.description: 0 = StateProvinceCode exists. 1 = StateProvinceCode unavailable, using CountryRegionCode.

country.description: ISO standard country or region code.

territory.description: ID of the territory in which the state or province is located. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

revisionNumber.description: Incremental number to track changes to the sales order over time.

orderDate.description: Dates the sales order was created.

dueDate.description: Date the order is due to the customer.

shipDate.description: Date the order was shipped to the customer.

status.description: Order current status. 1 = In process; 2 = Approved; 3 = Backordered; 4 = Rejected; 5 = Shipped; 6 = Cancelled

isOrderedOnline.description: 0 = Order placed by sales person. 1 = Order placed online by customer.

customerId.description: Customer identification number. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

salesPersonId.description: Sales person who created the sales order. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

territory.description: Territory in which the sale was made. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

billToAddress.description: Customer billing address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

shipToAddress.description: Customer shipping address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

shipMethod.description: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

creditCardId.description: Credit card identification number. Foreign key to CreditCard.CreditCardID.

creditCardApprovalCode.description: Approval code provided by the credit card company.

currencyRateId.description: Currency exchange rate used. Foreign key to CurrencyRate.CurrencyRateID.

subTotal.description: Sales subtotal. Computed as SUM(SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal)for the appropriate SalesOrderID.

totalDue.description: Total due from customer. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

name.description: Address type description. For example, Billing, Home, or Shipping.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

AddressTypeDTO.description: Types of addresses stored in the Address table.

startDate.description: Date the component started being used in the assembly item.

endDate.description: Date the component stopped being used in the assembly item.

measurementUnit.description: Standard code identifying the unit of measure for the quantity.

bomlevel.description: Indicates the depth the component is from its parent (AssemblyID).

perAssemblyQuantity.description: Quantity of the component needed to create the assembly.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

BillOfMaterialDTO.description: Items required to make bicycles and bicycle subassemblies. It identifies the heirarchical relationship between a parent product and its components.

isManufactured.description: 0 = Product is purchased, 1 = Product is manufactured in-house.

isSaleable.description: 0 = Product is not a salable item. 1 = Product is salable.

reorderPoint.description: Inventory level that triggers a purchase order or work order.

sizeUnit.description: Unit of measure for Size column.

weightUnit.description: Unit of measure for Weight column.

daysToManufacture.description: Number of days required to manufacture the product.

productLine.description: R = Road, M = Mountain, T = Touring, S = Standard

class.description: H = High, M = Medium, L = Low

style.description: W = Womens, M = Mens, U = Universal

subcategory.description: Product is a member of this product subcategory. Foreign key to ProductSubCategory.ProductSubCategoryID.

model.description: Product is a member of this product model. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

sellStartDate.description: Date the product was available for sale.

sellEndDate.description: Date the product was no longer available for sale.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

ProductDTO.description: Products sold or used in the manfacturing of sold products.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

businessEntityId.description: Primary key. Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

BusinessEntityContactDTO.description: Cross-reference table mapping stores, vendors, and employees to people

personType.description: Primary type of person: SC = Store Contact, IN = Individual (retail) customer, SP = Sales person, EM = Employee (non-sales), VC = Vendor contact, GC = General contact

nameStyle.description: 0 = The data in FirstName and LastName are stored in western style (first name, last name) order.  1 = Eastern style (last name, first name) order.

title.description: A courtesy title. For example, Mr. or Ms.

middleName.description: Middle name or middle initial of the person.

suffix.description: Surname suffix. For example, Sr. or Jr.

emailPromotion.description: 0 = Contact does not wish to receive e-mail promotions, 1 = Contact does wish to receive e-mail promotions from AdventureWorks, 2 = Contact does wish to receive e-mail promotions from AdventureWorks and selected partners.

additionalContactInfo.description: Additional contact information about the person stored in xml format.

demographics.description: Personal information such as hobbies, and income collected from online shoppers. Used for sales analysis.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

PersonDTO.description: Human beings involved with AdventureWorks: employees, customer contacts, and vendor contacts.

storeId.description: Primary key. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

salesPersonId.description: ID of the sales person assigned to the customer. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

demographics.description: Demographic informationg about the store such as the number of employees, annual sales and store type.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

vendorId.description: Primary key for Vendor records.  Foreign key to BusinessEntity.BusinessEntityID

creditRating.description: 1 = Superior, 2 = Excellent, 3 = Above average, 4 = Average, 5 = Below average

isPreferred.description: 0 = Do not use if another vendor is available. 1 = Preferred over other vendors supplying the same product.

isActive.description: 0 = Vendor no longer used. 1 = Vendor is actively used.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

VendorDTO.description: Companies from whom Adventure Works Cycles purchases parts or other goods.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

ContactTypeDTO.description: Lookup table containing the types of business entity contacts.

countryRegionCode.description: ISO standard code for countries and regions.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.

CountryRegionDTO.description: Lookup table containing the ISO standard codes for countries and regions.

currencyCode.description: The ISO code for the Currency.

modifiedDate.description: Date and time the record was last updated.
